trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lakewood
There were no other sightings in Lakewood on or around June 3rd 2011
Summary: looked up and saw 5 large lights in the shape of a V or arrow
divs: Sighting Detailswalking dog at approximatly 9:20. Looked up to see the stars, and straight overhead say 5 large dimly illuminated lights in the shape of a V heading in a SSE direction. Estimated to be one object, a few hundred feet in altitude, moving at 50 to 70 mph, guessing size as that of a F-15 or 737. A helicopter was flying about half a mile away and thats the only sound I could hear. I could not see an outline of the object, just the lights. Like I said , it was very dimly lit, so the sighting was only about 15 sec. long. I'm just curious to know if I was the only one to see it. I was standing in front of my house. I always look at the night sky to see the stars and air traffic. I live about 25 miles from LAX and about 10 miles from LGB, so there's usually something in the sky. This object was nothing close to anything I've ever seen. I knew this was a similar looking object to sightings from UFO programs on TV. It moved smoothly and silently. I lost sight of it due to it's quickly dimness. I was a bit stunned, but I knew I saw, what I saw.
